item.title: Socio-Economic indicators of Ethiopia
item.description: Project Overview Ethiopia is located in East Africa one the oldest nations in the world. Ethiopia has faced different natural and human made problems. The country one on the former members of the United Nations and the founder of the African Union. One of the UnColonized nations in the world history. Ethiopia implemented different economic and social strategies for the development of its nations.

item.title: Health Tweet analysis
item.description:
Project idea There are different health tweets from different news agencies. This health tweets from bbc, cbc,and many more. The data is publicly available here.
Data pre-processing I will start by reading the all the 16 health tweets from news agencies. library(dplyr) library(tidyr) library(purrr) library(readr) library(ggplot2) library(textdata) theme_set(theme_bw()) raw_text <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/yihunzeleke/data_repo/master/raw_text.csv") raw_text ## # A tibble: 63,327 x 4 ## newsgroup date text id ## <chr> <date> <chr> <dbl> ## 1 bbchealth 2015-04-09 Breast cancer risk test devised http://bbc.

item.title: Animal-intake Dashboard
item.description: Project idea This project is based on the Animal Center Intakes from Oct, 1st 2013 to present. Intakes represent the status of animals as they arrive at the Animal Center. All animals receive a unique Animal ID during intake. Annually over 90% of animals entering the center, are adopted, transferred to rescue or returned to their owners. The data is availabel here. For the final product of interactive dashboard click here.

item.title: Health Extension Package and Mother's Health Seeking Behavior for Common Childhood Illness
item.description: Abstract Background - Mothers’ health care seeking behaviors have importance to avoid many deaths attributed to delays and mothers’ response for signs and symptoms of childhood illness is very crucial to reduce severity and complications. Mothers from Ethiopia delay in appropriate care from health institutions and not seek any care contributes to the large number of child deaths. To improve the mothers ‘health seeking behaviors and coverage of basic health care services health extension package program remains the core to reduce child deaths in rural residences.

item.title: About Me
item.description: I am Yihun Zeleke. I got my Bsc Degree in Applied Statistics from Jimma university in 2010 and I also have Masters degree in Public Health from Bahir Dar University in 2017. I have worked for the government of Ethiopia in Central Statistical Agency as Statistician, Data Manager, Cspro Programmer, and Data Analytics for more than 7 years. I moved to USA in May 2018, I have worked for WESTAT here in USA as Cspro programmer consultant.
